title.narrative: Asia Regional Trade and Connectivity Programme - ICRIER

description.narrative: This activity (Asia Regional Trade and Connectivity Programme - ICRIER) is a component of Asia Regional Trade and Connectivity Programme (ARTCP) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £488,248. This component benefits Asia, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Transport policy and administrative management, Trade policy and administrative management, Trade facilitation. , with the following implementing partners: Indian Council for Research on International Economic Relations. The start date is 01-04-2018 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

participating-org.narrative: Indian Council for Research on International Economic Relations
